name: Add new Monday items for every Gravity Forms entry
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically transferring new entries from Gravity Forms to Monday.com. With this template, every time a new form submission is received in Gravity Forms, Make will create a corresponding item in your Monday.com board, ensuring that your team stays organized and up-to-date without any manual effort. Perfect for managing leads, feedback, or any other data collected through your forms.
